content: iiiggg @@@llliiittttttllleee___ssstttiiitttccchhheeesss___cccrrroooccchhheeettt wwwaaattteeerrr bbbooottttttllleee bbbaaaggg wwwaaattteeerrr bbbooottttttllleee bbbaaaggg crochet hook - 3 75mm yarn- papatya microfibre needle to weave in ends scissors stitches used- half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdcinc- half_double_crochet increase hdcblo- half_double_crochet back loop only slip_stitch- slip_stitch chain- chain double_crochet- double_crochet single_crochet- single_crochet magic_ring- magic_ring fo- fasten_off you may use any size hook to match your yarn and any yarn you choose bear in mind that a bigger or smaller yarn/hook will effect the number of row i chose to use a bigger hook than the yarn recommends to create a slightly looser stitch please note that cotton is always a good choice for bags as it stretches less if you choose a different yarn be mindful that it may stretch more when your bottle ia full so it would be advisable to make your bag shorter than the length of the bottle wwwaaattteeerrr bbbooottttttllleee bbbaaaggg this bag is made from the base up with the strap worked straight on to it the pattern uses us crochet terms all rounds are joined with a slip-stitch and a new round starts with chain stitches the chain stitches for the base do not count as a stitch the chain 5 for the body counts as a double_crochet and a ch2 pattern make a magic_ring and chain 2 work 6 half_double_crochet in to the ring and join to the top of the chain 2 with a slip_stitch 1- ch2 hdcinc in to each stitch join with a slip_stitch 12 half_double_crochet 2- ch2 half_double_crochet increase around join with a slip_stitch 18hdc 3- ch2 2 half_double_crochet increase around join with a slip_stitch 24hdc continue increasing until the base is your desired width following the increase pattern of 3hdc increase 30 - 4hdc increase 36 - 5hdc increase 42 always join with a slip_stitch and ch2 next work one round of hdcblo next you will make three joined rounds of half_double_crochet at this point i turned my work right side out so that the tail form the magic_ring is inside the bag we will weave that in later turning work like this is your choice i just prefer the appearance wwwaaattteeerrr bbbooottttttllleee bbbaaaggg we now move on to the body of the bag which is made of chains and double crochets as in filet crochet the chain 5 at the start of the round counts as a double_crochet and a chain 2 work your slip_stitch join in to the top of the third chain for the next rounds you will start with a chain 5 skip two stitches double_crochet in the next stitch now continue the round as follows ch2 sk2 double_crochet work in this manner until you have reached a couple of centimetres below the height of your bottle when your bottle is full the bag will stretch so keep the final round a little shorter to compensate keep trying your water bottle in the bag to ensure it fits whilst stretched once height has been achieved join with slip_stitch and then make a chain
